presentationColumns.name: Expense Distribution Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice expense distribution amount for AP Invoices and considers all invoice types. Excludes cancelled distributions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Expense Distributions.Expense Distribution Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expense Distribution Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice expense distribution count for AP Invoices and considers all invoice types. Excludes cancelled distributions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Expense Distributions.Expense Distribution Count

presentationColumns.name: Prepayment Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Prepayment amount for invoices of type Prepayment. This metric should be used with the Prepayment Invoice Number and Prepayment Line Number attributes to show the Prepayment or Prepayment line level amounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Expense Distributions.Prepayment Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Applied Prepayment Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the prepayment amount applied to invoices. This metric should be used with the Prepayment Invoice Number and Prepayment Line Number attributes to show the Prepayment or Prepayment line level amounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Expense Distributions.Applied Prepayment Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Available Prepayment Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the available prepayment amount, calculated as Prepayment Amount - Applied Prepayment Amount. This metric should be used with the Prepayment Invoice Number and Prepayment Line Number attributes to show the Prepayment or Prepayment line level amounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Expense Distributions.Available Prepayment Amount in Document Currency
